concept.title: Configuring the DataPower appliance for monitoring
concept.shortdesc: Before a DataPower appliance can be monitored by the DataPower data collector, configure the DataPower appliance by completing these tasks, described in more detail in the sections that follow:

ul.li: Upgrade your DataPower firmware to the minimum supported version.
Configure a user account on the DataPower appliance for use with the DataPower data collector.
Enable the XML Management Interface on the appliance.
Check additional optional settings for each domain to be monitored.
Enable the ITCAM for transforms for the Web Services Proxy gateways and the Multi-Protocol gateways as needed.
Configure the AAA policy for the Web Services Proxy gateways and the Multi-Protocol gateways if you plan to monitor Web service requesters by user ID.
